name: PicPu
summary:
PicPu is a very attractive photo puzzle. Just like Jigsaw puzzle, it is the best kill time game.
PicPu is a block puzzle, you need assemble the block to correct position.
This game will step by step to increase difficulty. It is a challenge!
We are planning to release different series of PicPu. This game is Cat series.
And we hope you can enjoy it.
